file.title: Index of regular

p.text: The command searches in the text a specified pattern of regular expression (e.g. "Image1\.(jpg|gif|png)") and returns the number of character the string starts with. In case nothing was found the command returns "0". How to compose regular expressions learn there: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regexp.
